attributes.action: Stop holiday companies increasing prices for with special needs to get a break.
attributes.additional_details: Stop holiday companies increasing prices for families which make it harder for families with special needs to get a break. Which effects the families mental health
attributes.background: Stop holiday companies increasing prices for families which make it harder for families with special needs to get a break. Which effects the families mental health

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Prices for holidays are set by individual businesses, but disability discrimination is against the law, so it would be illegal to charge a family more because someone had SEND.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
